${modID}:Parrot.NAME: Parrot
${modID}:Parrot.DESCRIPTION: Ethereal. NL At the end of your turn, the last card played that turn is played again. NL (Does not stack.)
${modID}:Parrot.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: At the end of your turn, the last card played that turn is played again. NL (Does not stack.)

${modID}:Halberd.NAME: Halberd
${modID}:Halberd.DESCRIPTION: Equip a !M! / {D} ${modID}:Weapon. NL Whenever you attack with this ${modID}:Weapon, apply 3 ${modID}:Bleed to a target per hit.

${modID}:DrunkenSailor.NAME: Drunken Sailor
${modID}:DrunkenSailor.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you use a potion, its effect is applied an additional time.

${modID}:SwordDance.NAME: Sword Dance
${modID}:SwordDance.DESCRIPTION: This turn, your next !M! Attacks use all equipped ${modID}:Weapons.
${modID}:SwordDance.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: This turn, your next !M! Attacks use all equipped ${modID}:Weapons.

${modID}:GhostInTheRum.NAME: Ghost in the Rum
${modID}:GhostInTheRum.DESCRIPTION: Gain 1 Intangible. NL Lose !M! ${modID}:Resistance. NL Exhaust.

${modID}:GoldenStrike.NAME: Golden Strike
${modID}:GoldenStrike.DESCRIPTION: Deal damage equal to NL 1.5% of Gold gained NL this run.
${modID}:GoldenStrike.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal damage equal to NL !M! + 1.5% of Gold gained NL this run.

${modID}:PowderKeg.NAME: Powder Keg
${modID}:PowderKeg.DESCRIPTION: Equip a {A} / {D} ${modID}:Weapon. NL When it is destroyed, deal !M! damage to ALL enemies.

${modID}:RemoveScurvy.NAME: Remove Scurvy
${modID}:RemoveScurvy.DESCRIPTION: Heal !M! HP. NL Remove all of your debuffs. NL Exhaust.

${modID}:InfiniteBarrage.NAME: Infinite Barrage
${modID}:InfiniteBarrage.DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, add a *Cannonball into your hand.

${modID}:SwordOfWisdom.NAME: Sword of Wisdom
${modID}:SwordOfWisdom.DESCRIPTION: Equip a {A} / !M! ${modID}:Weapon. NL Whenever you attack with this ${modID}:Weapon, draw 1 card.

${modID}:SwordOfChaos.NAME: Sword of Chaos
${modID}:SwordOfChaos.DESCRIPTION: Equip a {A} / !M! ${modID}:Weapon. NL Whenever you attack with this ${modID}:Weapon, add a random card into your hand.

${modID}:GoldenCannonball.NAME: Golden Cannonball
${modID}:GoldenCannonball.DESCRIPTION: Deal damage equal to NL 2% of Gold gained this run. NL Exhaust.
${modID}:GoldenCannonball.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal damage equal to NL !M! + 2% of Gold gained this run. NL Exhaust.

${modID}:FinalBarrage.NAME: Final Barrage
${modID}:FinalBarrage.DESCRIPTION: Deal damage equal to !M! times the number of Cannonballs played this combat. NL (Every type of Cannonball counts.)

${modID}:JollyRoger.NAME: Jolly Roger
${modID}:JollyRoger.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! Weak to ALL enemies. NL Exhaust.

${modID}:CaptainsCabin.NAME: Captain's Cabin
${modID}:CaptainsCabin.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Add !M! *Cannonball into your hand.
${modID}:CaptainsCabin.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Add !M! *Cannonballs into your hand.

${modID}:GoldenDefense.NAME: Golden Defense
${modID}:GoldenDefense.DESCRIPTION: Gain Block equal to NL 1.5% of Gold gained NL this run.
${modID}:GoldenDefense.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain Block equal to NL !M! + 1.5% of Gold gained NL this run.

${modID}:Toast.NAME: Toast
${modID}:Toast.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! ${modID}:Resistance. NL At the start of your next turn, lose !M! ${modID}:Resistance. NL Exhaust.

${modID}:CatONineTails.NAME: Cat O' Nine Tails
${modID}:CatONineTails.DESCRIPTION: Equip a !M! / {D} ${modID}:Weapon. NL After you attack with this ${modID}:Weapon, give it +2 Attack.

${modID}:Murder.NAME: Murder
${modID}:Murder.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage     NL to a non-Boss enemy. NL Fleeting.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: I have to target a #rnon-Boss enemy!

${modID}:Bandana.NAME: Bandana
${modID}:Bandana.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you hit an enemy, gain 5 Gold, NL up to a maximum of !M! Gold.

${modID}:TacticalRetreat.NAME: Tactical Retreat
${modID}:TacticalRetreat.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Draw 1 more card next turn.

${modID}:Dagger.NAME: Dagger
${modID}:Dagger.DESCRIPTION: Equip a {A} / !M! ${modID}:Weapon. NL At the start of your turn, NL 1 Durability from Dagger is used to deal damage equal to its Attack to a random enemy.

${modID}:PiratesWill.NAME: Pirate's Will
${modID}:PiratesWill.DESCRIPTION: Remove all of your debuffs. NL Draw !M! card. NL Exhaust.

${modID}:Eyepatch.NAME: Eyepatch
${modID}:Eyepatch.DESCRIPTION: Next turn, gain !M! Weak. NL At the start of your turn, draw 1 additional card.
${modID}:Eyepatch.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL Next turn, gain !M! Weak. NL At the start of your turn, draw 1 additional card.

${modID}:BlindAttacks.NAME: Blind Attacks
${modID}:BlindAttacks.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to a random enemy 3 times.

${modID}:Boarding.NAME: Boarding
${modID}:Boarding.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies twice. NL Draw !M! cards.

${modID}:AgileStrike.NAME: Agile Strike
${modID}:AgileStrike.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL If you have equipped a ${modID}:Weapon this turn, reduce cost of this NL card to 0.

${modID}:DangerousBlow.NAME: Dangerous Blow
${modID}:DangerousBlow.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL At the end of your next turn, you take !M! damage.

${modID}:VengefulSpirit.NAME: Vengeful Spirit
${modID}:VengefulSpirit.DESCRIPTION: Gain 1 Intangible. NL The next time your Intangible wears off, you take !M! damage. NL Exhaust.

${modID}:Revenge.NAME: Revenge
${modID}:Revenge.DESCRIPTION: Deal 0 - !M! damage to ALL enemies, based on how many % of HP you are missing.

${modID}:GoldenRain.NAME: Golden Rain
${modID}:GoldenRain.DESCRIPTION: Deal damage equal to NL 2.5% of Gold gained NL this run to ALL enemies.
${modID}:GoldenRain.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal damage equal to NL 3% of Gold gained NL this run to ALL enemies.

${modID}:Sword.NAME: Sword
${modID}:Sword.DESCRIPTION: Choose 1 of 3 Swords. NL Equip a {A} / !M! ${modID}:Weapon with an additional effect.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: #rFire: Whenever you attack with this Weapon, deal #b3 damage to ALL enemies. NL #yWisdom: Whenever you attack with this Weapon, draw #b1 card. NL #pChaos: Whenever you attack with this Weapon, add a random card into your hand.

${modID}:BeatUp.NAME: Beat Up
${modID}:BeatUp.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage twice. NL Apply !M! Vulnerable.

${modID}:ChaoticDefense.NAME: Chaotic Defense
${modID}:ChaoticDefense.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Add !M! random card into your hand.
${modID}:ChaoticDefense.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Add !M! random cards into your hand.

${modID}:SmithingHammer.NAME: Smithing Hammer
${modID}:SmithingHammer.DESCRIPTION: Equip a {A} / !M! ${modID}:Weapon. NL After you attack with this ${modID}:Weapon and passively at the start of your turn using 1 Durability, Upgrade a random card in your hand and a random card in your draw pile for the rest of combat.

${modID}:WeaponMastery.NAME: Weapon Mastery
${modID}:WeaponMastery.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you equip a ${modID}:Weapon, draw !M! card.
${modID}:WeaponMastery.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Whenever you equip a ${modID}:Weapon, draw !M! cards.

${modID}:Anchor.NAME: Anchor
${modID}:Anchor.DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL Gain !B! Block. NL Exhaust.
${modID}:Anchor.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL Gain !B! Block. NL Draw !M! card. NL Exhaust.

${modID}:BoostMorale.NAME: Boost Morale
${modID}:BoostMorale.DESCRIPTION: Gain 5 Gold. NL Draw !M! card. NL Gain [E]. NL Exhaust.
${modID}:BoostMorale.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain 5 Gold. NL Draw !M! cards. NL Gain [E]. NL Exhaust.

${modID}:DelayedPain.NAME: Delayed Pain
${modID}:DelayedPain.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL At the end of your next turn, you take !M! damage.

${modID}:ArmorUp.NAME: Armor Up
${modID}:ArmorUp.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you attack with a ${modID}:Weapon, gain !M! Block.

${modID}:Intoxication.NAME: Intoxication
${modID}:Intoxication.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! ${modID}:Resistance. NL At the start of your turn, lose 1 ${modID}:Resistance.

${modID}:CannonballSupply.NAME: Cannonball Supply
${modID}:CannonballSupply.DESCRIPTION: Retain. NL Add 3 *Cannonballs into your hand.
${modID}:CannonballSupply.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Retain. NL Add 3 *Cannonballs+ into your hand.

${modID}:BountyHunter.NAME: Bounty Hunter
${modID}:BountyHunter.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL If Fatal, gain !M! Gold. NL Exhaust.

${modID}:GoldenNoose.NAME: Golden Noose
${modID}:GoldenNoose.DESCRIPTION: Deal damage equal to NL 4% of Gold gained this run.
${modID}:GoldenNoose.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal damage equal to NL 5% of Gold gained this run.

${modID}:DoubleBottom.NAME: Double Bottom
${modID}:DoubleBottom.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Next turn, gain !B! Block.

${modID}:Provisioning.NAME: Provisioning
${modID}:Provisioning.DESCRIPTION: Obtain a random potion. NL Next turn, obtain a random potion. NL Exhaust.

${modID}:TerrorOfTheSeas.NAME: Terror of the Seas
${modID}:TerrorOfTheSeas.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! Vulnerable to ALL enemies. NL Exhaust.

${modID}:DoubleCannonball.NAME: Double Cannonball
${modID}:DoubleCannonball.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Add a *Cannonball into your hand. NL Exhaust.
${modID}:DoubleCannonball.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Add a *Cannonball+ into your hand. NL Exhaust.

${modID}:SwordOfFire.NAME: Sword of Fire
${modID}:SwordOfFire.DESCRIPTION: Equip a {A} / !M! ${modID}:Weapon. NL Whenever you attack with this ${modID}:Weapon, deal 3 damage to ALL enemies.

${modID}:CloakAndCannonball.NAME: Cloak and Cannonball
${modID}:CloakAndCannonball.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Add a *Cannonball into your hand.
${modID}:CloakAndCannonball.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Add a *Cannonball+ into your hand.

${modID}:UndeadForm.NAME: Undead Form
${modID}:UndeadForm.DESCRIPTION: Gain 3 Intangible. NL The next time your Intangible wears off, you take !M! damage.

${modID}:FieryDefense.NAME: Fiery Defense
${modID}:FieryDefense.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Deal 3 damage to ALL enemies.
${modID}:FieryDefense.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Deal 3 damage to ALL enemies twice.

${modID}:VampiricScepter.NAME: Vampiric Scepter
${modID}:VampiricScepter.DESCRIPTION: Equip a !M! / {D} ${modID}:Weapon. NL Whenever you attack with this ${modID}:Weapon, heal !${modID}:M2! HP.

${modID}:ReapersScythe.NAME: Reaper's Scythe
${modID}:ReapersScythe.DESCRIPTION: Equip a !M! / {D} ${modID}:Weapon. NL Whenever you attack with this ${modID}:Weapon, apply 1 ${modID}:Reaper's Mark to a target per hit.

${modID}:PirateHook.NAME: Pirate Hook
${modID}:PirateHook.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL If this deals at least 10 damage, deal !D! damage again.

${modID}:DeadlyArsenal.NAME: Deadly Arsenal
${modID}:DeadlyArsenal.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Draw 1 card for each unique ${modID}:Weapon you have currently equipped.

${modID}:PowerHungry.NAME: Power-hungry
${modID}:PowerHungry.DESCRIPTION: Put !M! Power card from your draw pile into your hand. NL Exhaust.
${modID}:PowerHungry.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL Put !M! Power card from your draw pile into your hand. NL Exhaust.
